svg.aria-label: Three properties of zero-knowledge proofs: completeness, soundness, zero-knowledge

text.font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, sans-serif
-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, sans-serif

svg.text: In voting: eligible voters can vote, cheaters can’t, and private inputs stay private.

g.font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, sans-serif
g.text: If you are an eligible voter

text.font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, sans-serif

svg.text: In ZKVote: completeness = valid votes aren’t rejected; soundness = cheating is infeasible; zero-knowledge = identity and private inputs stay hidden.
